Description: Check out our other items!    Please see the attached photos, as what you see is exactly what you will receive. _________________________________________________________________ PAYMENTS   Payment to be made by PayPal ONLY.  We do NOT accept other forms of payment.  Local pick up customers: Please send a message and wait for an updated invoice, then complete payment through Paypal.  Payment MUST be received within 48 hours of auction end. After 48 hours, an unpaid item case will automatically be opened.     All Ontario customers will be subject to a 13% HST on top of item price.  This applies to local pick ups as well. BUYER is responsible for all duties, taxes and / or import fees that may be charged by your country's customs departments.     _________________________________________________________________ SHIPPING    We ONLY ship within Canada, USA.  Please note that it may take up to 14 days for some items to be delivered within the United States, longer for overseas.  We will combine shipping on multiple winning auctions.  Please send a message first and then wait for a combined invoice before submitting payment.  We ship our items via Canada Post from Windsor, Ontario, Canada.  Shipping costs reflect what we pay for shipping; no handling cost is charged. All shipments within Canada include tracking.   Only shipments to the U.S. over $20 U.S. include tracking. We ONLY ship to PayPal Confirmed Addresses.  Please ensure your Paypal address is correct, as this is where your item will be shipped.  No exceptions.   _________________________________________________________________ AS IS ITEMS POLICY   If items are being sold AS IS they are a FINAL SALE!!  **PLEASE READ DESCRIPTIONS CAREFULLY **    We do our best to fully test every item that is listed and disclose any issues that the item may have.  If you have a concern or question regarding something about the item that is not in the listing description,  PLEASE EMAIL US FIRST and we will test or send more photos if required.  _________________________________________________________________ RETURN POLICY   We will accept returns within 30 days of receipt of the item. A restocking fee of 10% will be charged. Once the item is received on our end, you will receive a refund via Paypal,  IF the item is in the same condition to which it was shipped; no alterations will be accepted. Buyer pays return shipping. NO partial refunds will be issued.   If you have an issue with an item that has been sold,  PLEASE CONTACT US FIRST BEFORE LEAVING FEEDBACK.  We will do our absolute best to ensure you are satisfied with the item and strive for your positive feedback.    All emails will only be replied during business hours: Monday - Friday 9:00 am - 5:00pm EST.  Please ask any questions before bidding. Don't be shy!
Title: Gibson BluesHawk 6-String Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: 2002 Gibson BluesHawk 6-string Electric Guitar. Made in USA. Minty hard case. Few scratches on back of guitar from use.
